member.name: F:ET.FW.Config.Testbench.equipmentManagerTypes
member.summary: Dictionary, where the EquipmentManagerTypes are references to the corresponding Equipments. Used to determine, which EquipmentManager to instantiate for a new Equipment.

member.name: P:ET.FW.Config.Testbench.EquipmentManagers
member.summary: Dictionary holding all created EquipmentManagers. One instance of an EquipmentManager may be referenced with multiple keys if it is used for multiple equipment-types.

member.name: M:ET.FW.Config.Testbench.PrepareEquipmentManagerTypes
member.summary:
Creates a Dictionary containing all EquipmentManager-Types found in corresponding Framework- and Usage-DLLs, indexed by a list of those deviceTypes supported by the corresponding EquipmentManager. The supported types are fetched from EquipmentTypeAttributes.
Only those EquipmentManager-Types are added to the dictionary, which have at least one EquipmentTypeAttribute.
The returned value is assigned to the member equipmentManagerTypes.

member.name: M:ET.FW.Config.Testbench.GetEquipmentManagerType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the type of the equipment manager.
member.returns: KeyvaluePair of device type names and associated equipment manager

member.param: The deviceType, for which the EquipmentManager is requested.
member.returns: The found EquipmentManager or null, if none exists.

member.summary: Returns the existing EquipmentManager for the given deviceType or creates a new one, of none exists.
member.param: The deviceType for which the corresponding EquipmentManager is requested.
out: the found equipmentManager or null if none exists and none could be created.
member.returns: TRUE if an equipmentManager was found or created, FALSE otherwise.

member.returns: TRUE if an existing EquipmentManager was found, FALSE otherwise.
